import { useState } from 'react' import React from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../assets/logo.png' import cartIcon from '../assets/Trolley.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Navbar = () => { const [menu,setMenu] = useState("shops") return (
Happy Shoppy...
  • {setMenu("shop")}}> Shop {menu === "shop"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("mens")}}> Men {menu === "mens"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("womens")}}> women {menu === "womens"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("kids")}}> Kids {menu === "kids"?
    :<>}
0
) } export default Navbar
